_sText:
THE MAP IS NO BETA ANYMORE! MAP UPDATE VERSION 2.1
==================

Dont Like GameBanana's Mirrors? Moddb? 
==================
[Moddb Download]( www.moddb.com/games/counter-strike-source/addons/de-flaww-21 "/games/counter-strike-source/addons/de-flaww-21")

__________________


**The color correction is under suspicion of not working, then tell, if you want it fixed**

All impportant stuff have been compiled into the .BSP

Fixes:
======

- More light added
- Bomb sign error (showed 'A' towards 'B')
- Decal credits
- 2 extra spawn points to each team (total 22)
- Colorcorrection 'Hospital_main.raw' from valve's L4D added (2.1 SEPERATE FROM THE .BSP!)
- Little fixes as shadow
- Sealed off the map (No leak escape rutes)

(If any other bug, report!)

Thank you again :D

Credits: Komaokc, Phantom and Carma

### Content of custom compiled textures: sky16bk.vmt, sky16bk.vtf, sky16dn.vmt, sky16dn.vtf, sky16ft.vmt, sky16ft.vtf, sky16lf.vmt, sky16lf.vtf, sky16rt.vmt, sky16rt.vtf, sky16up.vmt and sky16up.vtf

___________________________________


Dir!/Install: 
=============

\Steam\steamapps\SteamAccount\counter-strike source\cstrike\ maps

------------------------------------------------------------------

For the Skybox, follow the link to GameBanana(FPSBanana):

[Skybox by KOMAOKC](http://www.gamebanana.com/members/289553 "/members/289553")

[The skybox link](http://www.gamebanana.com/textures/2978 "/textures/2978")
